name: Hexxagen #162
description:
In the near future, there lived a group of humans who chose a different reality. They make deals and form colonies within the tezos blockchain network call hexxaverse.

They call themselves Hexxagen. There are 888 characters created by the machine according to their respective tasks and abilities.

Hexxagen enters the blockchain network using a hexagonal capsule. This capsule was found in the ruins of the city hall building in a forbidden city. No one knows who created the capsule and its supporting equipment. The initial 6 hexxagens consisting of the elements iron, gold, electricity, atom, shadow and laser. Each hexxagen has a dominant element.

They play, live and work in the blockchain network, be prepared for their invasion.
